TextBlock.Text: OENO: Welcome to <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth,</color> friends! You may find both our <color=orange>campsite</color> and <color=orange>mining site</color> by following the path down into the geyser mountain.
OENO: Of note: Please take care not to leave the warp receiver's return warp powered and unattended!
OENO: Each time a warp receiver is used, the warp receiver powers a single-use return warp, allowing for travel back to the corresponding warp transmitter.

OENO: However, as the native life of <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color> are amphibious, an unattended return warp could allow these species to be unintentionally warped to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin!</color>
OENO: Without any air supply or protection from the heat on that planet, the lives of these native species would be gravely endangered by our carelessness.
OENO: As return warps are only powered upon the absence of all entities on the warp receiver, we advise visitors to stall the return warp until ready to return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin.</color>
